column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Wow this place is awesome. We came here after a long day and night in Houston. They don't close until 2 a.m. Â The server had some spot on recommendations for us. We got a variety of appetizers. All were delicious. The server recommended the spicy miso ramen. Wow
column2: hands down the best bowl of soup I've ever eaten. If you haven't eaten here yet
column3: do yourself a favor and check it out. Prices are good. Food is great. Service is spot on. The restaurant has a really hip vibe. Love it. Will be back the next time we are in Houston.
